verses.verse: "On my bed <S%H4904><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> after night I sought <S%H1245><s%> him Whom <S%H7945><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> loves; <S%H157><s%> I sought <S%H1245><s%> him but did not find <S%H4672><s%> him.

'I must arise <S%H6965><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> and go <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> the city; <S%H5892><s%> In the streets <S%H7784><s%> and in the squares <S%H7339><s%> I must seek <S%H1245><s%> him whom <S%H7945><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> loves. <S%H157><s%>' I sought <S%H1245><s%> him but did not find <S%H4672><s%> him.

"The watchmen <S%H8104><s%> who make <S%H5437><s%> the rounds <S%H5437><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> me, [And I said,] 'Have you seen <S%H7200><s%> him whom <S%H7945><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> loves <S%H157><s%>?'

"Scarcely <S%H4592><s%> had I left <S%H5674><s%> them When <S%H5704><s%> <S%H7945><s%> I found <S%H4672><s%> him whom <S%H7945><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> loves; <S%H157><s%> I held <S%H270><s%> on to him and would not let <S%H7503><s%> him go, <S%H7503><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> I had brought <S%H935><s%> him to my mother's house, <S%H1004><s%> And into the room <S%H2315><s%> of her who conceived <S%H2029><s%> me."

"I adjure <S%H7650><s%> you, O daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> By the gazelles <S%H6643><s%> or <S%H176><s%> by the hinds <S%H355><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> That you will not arouse <S%H5782><s%> or awaken <S%H5782><s%> [my] love, <S%H160><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> she pleases. <S%H2654><s%>"

"What <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H384><s%> coming <S%H5927><s%> up from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> Like columns <S%H8490><s%> of smoke, <S%H6227><s%> Perfumed <S%H6999><s%> with myrrh <S%H4753><s%> and frankincense, <S%H3828><s%> With all <S%H3605><s%> scented <S%H81><s%> powders <S%H81><s%> of the merchant <S%H7402><s%>?

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is the [traveling] couch <S%H4296><s%> of Solomon; <S%H8010><s%> Sixty <S%H8346><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, Of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"All <S%H3605><s%> of them are wielders <S%H270><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> Expert <S%H3925><s%> in war; <S%H4421><s%> Each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> has his sword <S%H2719><s%> at his side, <S%H3409><s%> [Guarding] against <S%H4480><s%> the terrors <S%H6343><s%> of the night. <S%H3915><s%>
"King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> has made <S%H6213><s%> for himself a sedan <S%H668><s%> chair <S%H668><s%> From the timber <S%H6086><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

"He made <S%H6213><s%> its posts <S%H5982><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> Its back <S%H7507><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> [And] its seat <S%H4817><s%> of purple <S%H713><s%> fabric, <S%H713><s%> [With] its interior <S%H8432><s%> lovingly <S%H160><s%> fitted <S%H7528><s%> out By the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"Go <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> O daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> And gaze <S%H7200><s%> on King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> with the crown <S%H5850><s%> With which <S%H7945><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%> has crowned <S%H5849><s%> him On the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wedding, <S%H2861><s%> And on the day <S%H3117><s%> of his gladness <S%H8057><s%> of heart. <S%H3820><s%>"
